title: Partnership for Localized Battery Manufacturing
description: IHC's EPointZero has signed a landmark 1 GWh battery storage deal with Enercap, marking one of the largest energy storage transactions globally. This presents a real opportunity for companies in battery manufacturing or renewable energy to participate in localized production and reduce reliance on foreign imports.
example: Companies like LG Chem or Panasonic can collaborate with EPointZero and Enercap to set up a local battery manufacturing plant in the UAE, capitalizing on the growing energy storage market and supporting the UAE’s shift towards clean energy solutions.
roadmap: Step 1: Conduct market research on the local battery manufacturing demands.
Step 2: Form a partnership agreement with IHC and Enercap to utilize local resources.
Step 3: Develop a manufacturing facility in the UAE focusing on sustainability.
Step 4: Launch products that cater to both local and regional needs.
source_name: IHC Concludes Impactful Participation at “Make it in the Emirates 2025” with 30+ Strategic Announcements, Accelerating Innovation and Domestic Industrial Growth

title: Joint Venture for AI Marketplace Development
description: IHC has launched SAIF, the world's first marketplace for AI solutions. This offers a unique opportunity for software development companies to integrate their solutions into the marketplace, reaching a broader customer base.
example: Companies like Salesforce or Microsoft can partner with IHC to provide advanced AI tools and solutions that can be listed on the SAIF platform, enhancing their market reach and presence in the UAE.
roadmap: Step 1: Identify potential software partners with robust AI solutions.
Step 2: Develop a partnership framework for integration into the SAIF marketplace.
Step 3: Conduct joint marketing campaigns to promote the marketplace.
Step 4: Launch integrated solutions and assess market performance.
source_name: IHC Concludes Impactful Participation at “Make it in the Emirates 2025” with 30+ Strategic Announcements, Accelerating Innovation and Domestic Industrial Growth

title: Sustainable Construction Materials Collaboration
description: IHC's partnership with Aldar for using hydrogen-based steel rebars in net-zero constructions offers opportunities for companies focused on sustainable building materials.
example: Companies like CEMEX or ArcelorMittal could collaborate with IHC and Aldar to supply sustainable materials and share technological innovations in low-carbon construction.
roadmap: Step 1: Engage in discussions with IHC and Aldar to understand material specifications.
Step 2: Develop a pilot project utilizing the hydrogen-based materials.
Step 3: Scale production based on demand and feedback.
Step 4: Promote the project as a model for sustainable construction in the region.
source_name: IHC Concludes Impactful Participation at “Make it in the Emirates 2025” with 30+ Strategic Announcements, Accelerating Innovation and Domestic Industrial Growth
